info.name: Real Estate Listing Platform Final
info.description: API collection for Real Estate Listing Platform

request.description: Get all active property listings without any filters
Search properties within a price range of $200,000 to $500,000
Search properties in San Francisco
Search properties in ZIP code 94102
Search properties in Mission District neighborhood

query.description: Options: HOUSE, APARTMENT, CONDO, TOWNHOUSE, LAND, COMMERCIAL, MULTI_FAMILY

request.description: Search for houses only
Search properties with 3-4 bedrooms
Search properties with at least 2 bathrooms
Search properties between 1500-3000 square feet
Search properties that have a garage
Search properties that have a pool
Search all properties sorted by price (lowest to highest)
Search all properties sorted by price (highest to lowest)

item.name: Search - Sort by Date Listed (Newest First)

request.description: Search all properties sorted by listing date (newest first)
Search all properties sorted by size (largest first)
Get first page with 10 results
Get second page with 10 results
Complex search: Houses in San Francisco, 3+ bedrooms, 2+ bathrooms, $300k-$800k, with garage, sorted by price
Complex search: Houses in San Francisco, 3+ bedrooms, 2+ bathrooms, $300k-$800k, with garage, sorted by price
Find all properties within 5km of San Francisco downtown
Find properties within 10km of Oakland, sorted by distance (nearest first)
Properties within 8km under $1.5M, sorted by distance
Find 1-2 bedroom properties within 5km of Google campus
Luxury properties with pool within 3km of Golden Gate Bridge

item.name: Geolocation - Family Home Near Schools (Palo Alto)

request.description: Family homes (3+ BR with garden) within 2km of Palo Alto
Properties within 3km of Stanford under $1.2M
Wide area search within 20km radius

query.description: Very small radius - immediate vicinity only

request.description: Find properties in immediate vicinity (1km) of SF City Hall

query.description: Very small radius - immediate vicinity only

request.description: Find properties in immediate vicinity (1km) of SF City Hall
Properties within 10km of SFO Airport

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Beautiful 3BR Family Home in Pacific Heights",
  "description": "Spacious and modern family home with stunning views. Features hardwood floors, updated kitchen with granite countertops, and a large backyard perfect for entertaining.",
  "propertyType": "HOUSE",
  "street": "123 Main St",
  "city": "San Francisco",
  "state": "CA",
  "zipCode": "94102",
  "neighborhood": "Pacific Heights",
  "location": {
    "lat": 37.7749,
    "lon": -122.4194
  },
  "bedrooms": 3,
  "bathrooms": 2,
  "squareFeet": 2000,
  "yearBuilt": 2010,
  "price": 850000,
  "photoUrls": [
    "https://example.com/photo1.jpg",
    "https://example.com/photo2.jpg",
    "https://example.com/photo3.jpg"
  ],
  "floorPlanUrl": "https://example.com/floorplan.pdf",
  "virtualTourUrl": "https://example.com/tour",
  "features": ["Hardwood Floors", "Updated Kitchen", "Granite Countertops", "Backyard", "Garage"],
  "hasGarage": true,
  "garageSpaces": 2,
  "hasPool": false,
  "hasGarden": true
}
